about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Mohamed Amin Smida — a 22-year-old software developer with a strong passion for building reliable and scalable web applications.
about.background: With over 3 years of experience in Laravel, I've also worked extensively with Node.js, NestJS, and the Directus CMS. I'm currently pursuing my engineering degree while working as a backend developer at a tech company in Tunis.
about.approach: Throughout my career, I've contributed to large-scale projects, gaining hands-on experience in solving real-world problems and delivering high-quality solutions that make a difference. If you're looking for someone who's committed, detail-oriented, and easy to collaborate with — I'd love to help bring your ideas to life.

laravel.title: Laravel
laravel.description: Built sophisticated backend systems with Laravel framework, focusing on scalability and performance. Developed RESTful APIs, implemented complex business logic, and optimized database queries for high-traffic applications. Expertise in Laravel's ecosystem including events, queues, and service providers.

reverb.title: Laravel Reverb
reverb.description: Developed real-time communication systems with Laravel Reverb, creating responsive and interactive applications. Implemented WebSocket solutions for instant notifications, live dashboards, and chat applications. Designed scalable broadcasting architecture with secure authentication and efficient channel management.

filament.title: Filament
filament.description: Built sophisticated admin panels and CRUD interfaces with Laravel Filament. Developed custom plugins and components to extend functionality, creating intuitive and powerful administrative dashboards for content management.

vue.title: Vue.js
vue.description: Engineered dynamic and responsive user interfaces with Vue.js, creating seamless user experiences. Developed single-page applications with component-based architecture, state management using Vuex, and client-side routing. Implemented reactive data binding, custom directives, and optimized rendering for high-performance web applications.

trisoweb.title: Software Engineering Intern
trisoweb.description: Contributed to the fullstack development of an e-commerce platform using Laravel and Vue.js, focusing on building scalable RESTful APIs and designing robust PostgreSQL database architecture. Integrated dynamic Vue.js components and collaborated with senior developers to enhance system performance and ensure development best practices.

satoripop.title: Backend Developer Intern
satoripop.description: Developed key features for a multichannel customer engagement platform (similar to Brevo/Mailchimp) using Laravel and Vue.js. Implemented secure API endpoints for email, SMS, and push notification services, and contributed to the messaging queue system for high-volume campaign delivery.
